meanings.definition: A unit of time used in measuring sedimentation rates.
meanings.sent1: Scientists often rely on svedbergs to calculate how fast sediments settle.
meanings.sent2: The lab report mentioned the sedimentation rate in svedbergs.
meanings.sent3: I wish I could measure time in svedbergs; it would make waiting for the bus more interesting.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was like svedbergs, slowly settling down after a hectic day.
meanings.sent5: The concept of svedbergs made the idea of time passing more tangible.

meanings.definition: A unit of sedimentation coefficient used in ultracentrifugation.
meanings.sent1: The ultracentrifuge displayed the sedimentation coefficient in svedbergs.
meanings.sent2: The scientist adjusted the settings to measure the sedimentation coefficient in svedbergs.
meanings.sent3: The svedbergs on the screen seemed to dance as the centrifuge spun.
meanings.sent4: The sedimentation coefficient moved like svedbergs, gracefully and steadily.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the svedbergs helped in determining the density of the sample.

meanings.definition: A unit of sedimentation velocity used in biophysics.
meanings.sent1: Biophysicists often discuss the sedimentation velocity in terms of svedbergs.
meanings.sent2: The research paper detailed the sedimentation velocity measured in svedbergs.
meanings.sent3: The svedbergs in the experiment seemed to race each other to the bottom.
meanings.sent4: The cells moved through the solution like svedbergs, each at its own pace.
meanings.sent5: Visualizing the sedimentation velocity in svedbergs made the process easier to comprehend.
